docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: TOMORROW night, you have sworn, is the last night of self-indulgence. Beginning Jan. 1, 1988, buerre blanc shall never again pass your lips; you will throw yourself on your sword before tasting a morsel of foie gras, and if you are ever tempted to drink more than a single glass of wine at dinner, you have given your nearest and dearest permission to wrest it from your grasp.
